notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: J.C.C. and M.E.B.S.d.O. conceptualized, designed, conducted, and analyzed the experiments, wrote the manuscript, and developed tables and figures. J.C.C. revised and edited the manuscript. M.E.B.S.d.O. formatted the manuscript according to journal instructions. A.S. performed the GC-MS analyses, analyzed the results, and constructed the phytochemical profile presented in Table 5. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
